widget.header: Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

config.title: Kevin Rodriguez
config.description: I am a student who wants to gain experience as a full-stack engineer and travel the world. I have taken multiple Python, JavaScript, and other programming skills courses during college on my own. I am interested in companies focused on cloud technology that do their best to achieve people's growth. I am very keen on books like Mistborn and games such as Factorio.
